snippet: All may be forgiven in Cleveland as Coach Mike Pettine decides to play Manziel at quarterback after benching him for two games.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Quarterback Johnny Manziel returns as starter for Cleveland Browns after being sidelined for excessive carousing during recent week off; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: All may be forgiven in Cleveland as Coach Mike Pettine decides to play Manziel at quarterback after benching him for two games.

headline.print_headline: Manziel Back as Starter for Browns
headline.main: Johnny Manziel Back as Starter for Browns
